object.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1291 (1658 with comment) chars
j=screen E=ipairs n=math G=input J=table.insert a=G.getNumber m=n.sin o=n.cos function K(_,e,c)return{_=_,e=e,c=c}end function aa(B,C)return{_=B._+C._,e=B.e+C.e,c=B.c+C.c}end function M(u)return u*n.pi*2 end function ak(_,q,x)return n.min(n.max(_,q),x)end function V(_,q,I,x,X)return ak((_-q)/(x-q),0,1)*(X-I)+I end function U(O,F,H)local k,i=o(O),m(O)local r,l=o(F),m(F)local h,p=o(H),m(H)return{{r*h,i*l*h-k*p,k*l*h+i*p},{r*p,i*l*p+k*h,k*l*p-i*h},{-l,i*r,k*r}}end function ai(D,A)return ac(function(g)return D[g][1]*A._+D[g][2]*A.e+D[g][3]*A.c end)end function ac(y)return{_=y(1),e=y(2),c=y(3)}end S=200 af=.25 t=0 f={}z=1 s={}function onTick()f=am()z=a(28)for g=0,7 do local v=g*4 if G.getBool(g+1)then local N=a(v+1)local L=M(a(v+2))local P=M(a(v+3))local d=N*o(P)local w=K(d*m(L),N*m(P),d*o(L))local b=f:Y(w)J(s,{b=b,u=t})else break end end local R={}for ab,d in E(s)do if t<=d.u+S then J(R,d)end end s=R t=t+1 end function am()local W,ae,Z=a(16),a(20),a(24)return{b=K(a(4),a(8),a(12)),ah=U(W,ae,Z),Y=function(Q,w)return aa(ai(Q.ah,w),Q.b)end}end function onDraw()local al,ag=j.getWidth(),j.getHeight()j.drawMap(f.b._,f.b.c,z)for ab,d in E(s)do local ad,T=map.mapToScreen(f.b._,f.b.c,z,al,ag,d.b._,d.b.c)local aj=V(d.u,0,1,S,af)j.setColor(255,0,255,aj*255)j.drawRectF(ad,T,1,1)end end

c1.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1291 (1658 with comment) chars
j=screen E=ipairs n=math G=input J=table.insert a=G.getNumber m=n.sin o=n.cos function K(_,e,c)return{_=_,e=e,c=c}end function aa(B,C)return{_=B._+C._,e=B.e+C.e,c=B.c+C.c}end function M(u)return u*n.pi*2 end function ak(_,q,x)return n.min(n.max(_,q),x)end function V(_,q,I,x,X)return ak((_-q)/(x-q),0,1)*(X-I)+I end function U(O,F,H)local k,i=o(O),m(O)local r,l=o(F),m(F)local h,p=o(H),m(H)return{{r*h,i*l*h-k*p,k*l*h+i*p},{r*p,i*l*p+k*h,k*l*p-i*h},{-l,i*r,k*r}}end function ai(D,A)return ac(function(g)return D[g][1]*A._+D[g][2]*A.e+D[g][3]*A.c end)end function ac(y)return{_=y(1),e=y(2),c=y(3)}end S=200 af=.25 t=0 f={}z=1 s={}function onTick()f=am()z=a(28)for g=0,7 do local v=g*4 if G.getBool(g+1)then local N=a(v+1)local L=M(a(v+2))local P=M(a(v+3))local d=N*o(P)local w=K(d*m(L),N*m(P),d*o(L))local b=f:Y(w)J(s,{b=b,u=t})else break end end local R={}for ab,d in E(s)do if t<=d.u+S then J(R,d)end end s=R t=t+1 end function am()local W,ae,Z=a(16),a(20),a(24)return{b=K(a(4),a(8),a(12)),ah=U(W,ae,Z),Y=function(Q,w)return aa(ai(Q.ah,w),Q.b)end}end function onDraw()local al,ag=j.getWidth(),j.getHeight()j.drawMap(f.b._,f.b.c,z)for ab,d in E(s)do local ad,T=map.mapToScreen(f.b._,f.b.c,z,al,ag,d.b._,d.b.c)local aj=V(d.u,0,1,S,af)j.setColor(255,0,255,aj*255)j.drawRectF(ad,T,1,1)end end
